memberdef.name: kws_funcs
memberdef.initializer: = { "kws", kws_search_start, kws_search_step, kws_search_finish, kws_search_reinit, kws_search_free, kws_search_lattice, kws_search_hyp, kws_search_prob, kws_search_seg_iter, }

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *keyphrase, const char *keyfile, cmd_ln_t *config, acmod_t *acmod, dict_t *dict, dict2pid_t *d2p)
memberdef.name: kws_search_init

briefdescription.para: Create, initialize and return a search module.

detaileddescription.para: Gets keywords either from keyphrase or from a keyphrase file.

briefdescription.para: Update KWS search module for new key phrase.
Prepare the KWS search structure for beginning decoding of the next utterance.
Step one frame forward through the Viterbi search.
Windup and clean the KWS search structure after utterance.
Get hypothesis string from the KWS search.
